help.title: Preferences
help.information: Some settings of XAMS can be edited within the GUI.

section.head: Welcome message at logon
section.description: Default is "Welcome to XAMS", can be changed (ord deactivated by an empty field) here.

section.head: Default Lines of Event-Log
section.description: This value sets the number of lines the Event history shows by default. Set this value to suit your screen resolution.

section.head: Online 'About XAMS'
section.description: This option changes the link of the menu-item "About XAMS" to an online page on xams.org. The advantage is that information found here is always up2date and may inform you of updates or eventual security problems.

section.head: Check for new versions
section.description: Xams has the ability to check for new versions over the internet. If this is the case it will be shown to an administrator after a successful login.

section.head: Default Language
section.description: Sets the default language of XAMS. Afterwards it still can be changed in the login window.
